Summary: On a perfectly clear day I witnessed an object at extremely high attitude stay stationary and then move to the south.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fleming Island
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat about 4:30 p.m. on saturday, 6 march 2010 i noticed a stationary object at extremely high attitude. note: i was at a soccer game just south of orange park, florida (fleming island). i thought i was witnessing venus or some bright planet rising in the east. after starring at it, i notice that it was not a planet. instead, it appeared to be a reflection of some metallic object. because of its location being just above the tops of some tall pine trees, i noticed that its relative position was not moving. after returning my attention for a few seconds to a soccer game that was underway and then back to this object i again noticed that its position had not changed. now i kept coming back and trying to find the and noticed that it had moved towards the south a small distance relative to the trees and was stationary again. again, this object was just above the top of pines and i was using them as reference as to where to look for it. this sequence of moving and stopping repeated itself about four times before it had moved well to the southeast. in the mean time, there were commercial aircraft in the area at altitude. i know the difference between aircraft of this object. the last i saw of this object was as it moved far to the southeast was when it's color turn to an orange\red and it disappeared. had it not been for this change in color i would have not been able to locate it because of the distance. again, this object was well above the flight altitudes for commercial aircraft.
